content: 11 13 14 times you should have 60 60 60 66 66 66 72 72 72 s on your needles switch to the darker colour and 3 5 mm needles *k1 k2tog* repeat from * to * until the end of the round you should end up with 40 40 40 44 44 44 48 48 48 s work a 2x2 rib k2 p2 for about 7 cm or 3 inches and bind off the same way s the body happy knitting thank you madeleine
